description.raw:
Remove all gazebo7 deprecations, I thought this could shave some seconds (hopefully minutes) from the build time. Hard to tell from the Jenkins jobs, I think they keep the workspace from previous runs...

Although they were deprecated, I couldn't just remove `Camera::SetWorldPose` and `Camera::MoveToPosition`, because they are still used by derived classes:

![jenkinsdep.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/108008361-jenkinsdep.png)

So:

* Changed `Camera::SetWorldPose` and `UserCamera::SetWorldPose` to be deprecated in Gazebo8

* Removed `UserCamera::MoveToPosition` and `OculusCamera::MoveToPosition`, because those were just calling the original function.

# CI

* [Homebrew](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/623/) is satisfied
